tasks.task_description: Create BentoGrid component with Halcyon aesthetic
Update Tailwind config with Halcyon colors
Create admin route for visual editing
Update homepage to use bento layout

description: Integrate Halcyon/Bento aesthetic and visual editing into existing Next.js portfolio
context: Installed framer-motion, clsx, and lucide-react dependencies successfully
Created BentoGrid component with Halcyon-inspired design, supporting blog posts, stats cards, about cards, newsletter signup, and activity feeds
Created VisualEditor component with drag-and-drop editing panel for bento grid items
Created Tailwind config with Halcyon-inspired colors and bento grid utilities
Created admin route with password authentication and visual editing interface
Updated homepage to showcase bento grid layout with interactive section and admin link
Added GitHub Pages deployment workflow and updated next.config.js for static export support
